body_html:
Thanks for reporting this. It is caused by constant folding. TF folds partial output of TopK on GPU with dtype float.

I am sending out a fix to change constant folding to either fold all the outputs of an op or not fold any outputs at all.
body_text:
Thanks for reporting this. It is caused by constant folding. TF folds partial output of TopK on GPU with dtype float.
I am sending out a fix to change constant folding to either fold all the outputs of an op or not fold any outputs at all.
body:
Thanks for reporting this. It is caused by constant folding. TF folds partial output of TopK on GPU with dtype float.

I am sending out a fix to change constant folding to either fold all the outputs of an op or not fold any outputs at all.
